contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 23, 1960 D Mossley Contest
Mossley Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
mossley-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Mechanics Hall, Mossley, Lancashire Best soprano - G.Proctor (Lindley) Best cornet and euphonium - Dobcross. Best horn - Gwen Garside (Linthwaite). Best trombone - R.Raynor (Dodsworth). Prizes - 1st £30, 2nd £15, 3rd £5. 2nd annual contest promoted by Mossley Band. 9 bands competed.
May 8, 2014, 8:47 a.m. Dec. 4, 2014, 5:47 p.m.
1 Haigh Prize Harry Bentham
2 Lofthouse Colliery A. Pollard
3 Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth
4 Hade Edge F. Longley
4 North Ashton Prize Leslie Naylor
Unknown Result Dobcross Silver Band Jimmy Platt
